name: DOCS_RCVD_SDOH
description: Contains discrete external social determinant of health information from.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: SDOH_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: This item stores the unique reference ID of a discrete social determinant of health documentation.

columns.name: SDOH_ENTRY_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the date a social determinant of health was documented for the patient.

columns.name: SDOH_CONCERN_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the Epic-standard concern level for a social determinant entry.

columns.name: SDOH_INTERPRETATION
columns.description: This item stores the free text description of the concern for a social determinant entry.

columns.name: SDOH_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the name of a social determinant entry.

columns.name: SDOH_DOM_CONFIG_ID
columns.description: This item stores the source (SDC) record that represents a social determinant entry.

columns.name: SDOH_ASMNT_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: This item stores the reference ID of the assessment this social determinant entry was created from.
